snippet: NASCAR driver Tony Stewart's involvement in a fatal on-track accident over the weekend may wave a caution flag for the big-money corporate sponsors backing the three-time champion's team, industry analysts said....

headline.print_headline: Stewart's Lethal Accident Could Cause NASCAR Sponsors to Rethink Deals
headline.main: Stewart's Lethal Accident Could Cause NASCAR Sponsors to Rethink Deals

lead_paragraph: NASCAR driver Tony Stewart's involvement in a fatal on-track accident over the weekend may wave a caution flag for the big-money corporate sponsors backing the three-time champion's team, industry analysts said.
